metadata.Title: CVE-2021-45481 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium.
metadata.Description: In WebKitGTK before 2.32.4, there is incorrect memory allocation in WebCore::ImageBufferCairoImageSurfaceBackend::create, leading to a segmentation violation and application crash, a different vulnerability than CVE-2021-30889.

criterions.comment: qtwebkit-opensource-src package in xenial is affected and may need fixing.
qtwebkit-source package in xenial is affected and may need fixing.
webkit2gtk package in xenial is affected, but a decision has been made to defer addressing it.
webkitgtk package in xenial is affected and may need fixing.
